## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (2f17c5fb067387338550534c2823be87fd6ad6a0547a19b511aa2bc278314105)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'mygcpconfusedfunctionpoctestpackage' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
